meta.title: Convert svgs file to jsx by one script

description:
#Run this script on terminal
npm link
#CLI


        
          
            npm
            
            yarn
            
            pnpm
contentHtml: #Run this script on terminal npm link #CLI npm yarn pnpm bun npx agile-svg2jsx --i $PATH_SVGS_FOLDER --o $PATH_REACT_FOLDER bash yarnx agile-svg2jsx --i $PATH_SVGS_FOLDER --o $PATH_REACT_FOLDER bash pnpx agile-svg2jsx --i $PATH_SVGS_FOLDER --o $PATH_REACT_FOLDER b
